headline: Intel Sharpens AI Focus With SambaNova Deal And Foundry Leadership Shift
summary: Intel has entered a multi year partnership with AI chip startup SambaNova to combine Intel Xeon processors with SambaNova AI accelerators. The company is aiming to offer a broader AI hardware stack for enterprise customers that are looking for alternatives to established GPU solutions. At the same time, Intel is undergoing leadership change in its Intel Foundry Services division, as its head departs for Qualcomm. Intel, traded as NasdaqGS:INTC, is sharpening its focus on AI hardware at a...
